item.description: Pilates is great for the person that wants to get in great shape and feel some inner peace while doing so. This exercise is very "dancer orientated" and works the core of the body to the max. In this class we will incorporate a body ball, blocks, resistance bands, but mostly use our own weight distribution to get a great and unique workout. New year special- $7/class or $60/10 classes Please register at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com at least 24 hours before the class

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Pilates
